Package org.epics.archiverappliance.engine.pv

PV factory functionality (inherited from CSS).

See: Description

  • Interface Summary 
    Interface Description
    ControllingPV
    PV's that can control the archiving of other PV's will need to implement this interface.
    PV
    A control system PV.
    PVListener
    A listener for PV updates.
  • Class Summary 
    Class Description
    DBR_Helper
    Helper for dealing with DBR..
    EngineContext
    the context for the Archiver Engine
    EPICS_V3_PV
    EPICS ChannelAccess implementation of the PV interface.
    EPICS_V4_PV  
    JCACommandThread
    JCA command pump, added for two reasons: JCA callbacks can't directly send JCA commands without danger of a deadlock, at least not with JNI and the "DirectRequestDispatcher".
    PVContext
    Handle PV context, pool PVs by name.
    PVFactory  
    PVMetrics
    PVMetrics includes the dynamic information of the pv
    RefCountedChannel
    A Channel with thread-safe reference count.
  • Enum Summary 
    Enum Description
    EPICS_V3_PV.MonitorMask
    Sourced from org/csstudio/platform/libs/epics/EpicsPlugin.java
    PVContext.MonitorMask  
    PVListener.DroppedReason
